original.question: Were Frank R. Strayer and Krzysztof Kieślowski both Directors?
original.context: Frank R. Strayer (September 21, 1891 – February 3, 1964) was an actor, film writer, director and producer. He was active from the mid-1920s until the early 1950s. Krzysztof Kieślowski (] ; 27 June 1941 – 13 March 1996) was a Polish art-house film director and screenwriter.
